reviewText: Remember you will need a DVD player that plays all regions. Interesting history, It could have been a bit longer given the history of the art.

I am equally annoyed regarding the accessibility of this disc- this is NOT playable in "all regions" as described. If this is supposed to be produced on demand, why would you produce a Region 2 DVD for a purchaser in Region 1? Improving movie metadata in the product descriptions is generally an area for improvement on Amazon, I believe.

What a rip off! Doesn't play at all. Didn't even say in description that it was for a different region. Save your money and save yourself frustration. I am very disappointed. Amazon: Do your customers a favor and be truthful in your descriptions
